course.title: PSY 7101 Causal Modeling in Psychological Research (3 units)
course.desc: Focus on the conceptual framework and analytic procedures associated with causal modeling, as it relates to psychological research. Specific applications include path analysis based on both multiple regression and analysis of covariance structures, and full structural equation modeling applied to cross-sectional as well as longitudinal designs. Each example studied is accompanied by required computer application work.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: PSY 6105 Factor Analysis in Psychological Research.
